// program
// load 64 into r1
000001000000 00000 000 00001 0010011
// load 72 (H in ASCII) into r2
000001001000 00000 000 00010 0010011
// store r2 into m[r1]
0000000 00010 00001 000 00000 0100011

// load 87 (W in ASCII) into r2
000001010111 00000 000 00010 0010011
// store r2 into m[r1 + 1]
0000000 00010 00001 000 00001 0100011

// jump to current position indefinitely
00000000000000000000 00000 1101111

========
// data (empty)
